articles.description: All the latest football news and discussion as Pep Guardiola agrees new Man City contract & Ruben Amorim set to hold first Man Utd news conference.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Ruben Amorim Man Utd news conference & Pep Guardiola signs two-year Man City  extension - latest and reaction

articles.description: A majority of Premier League clubs approve changes to rules governing commercial deals.
articles.title: Associated Party Transaction rules: Premier League clubs approve changes to rules governing commercial deals

articles.description: India rally to seize the initiative despite being dismissed for just 150 by Australia on the opening day of the first Test in Perth.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Virat Kohli fails again as 17 wickets fall on opening day of first Test in Perth

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton is fastest in a Mercedes one-two in first practice for the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: Las Vegas Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton leads George Russell in first practice

articles.description: McLaren CEO Zak Brown feels employing stewards on a full-time basis in Formula 1 will help simplify the "overly complicated" rules.
articles.title: McLaren CEO Zak Brown says F1 needs full-time stewards to simplify rules

articles.description: Arsenal had been written off after a poor start to the season but their late victory over Juventus capped off a significant turnaround.
articles.title: Arsenal: How 'reinvigorated' Gunners turned things around in Europe

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on The Farm singer and Liverpool fan Peter Hooton with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v The Farm singer & Liverpool fan Peter Hooton

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola signs a two-year contract extension to keep him at the club until 2027.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola contract: Manchester City manager signs two-year extension

articles.description: Ireland centre Bundee Aki admitted his performance against New Zealand "just wasn't good enough" after he was dropped from the matchday squad to face Argentina last week.
articles.title: Ireland v Fiji: Bundee Aki had to take Argentina omission 'on the chin' after All Blacks showing

articles.description: Franz Wagner scores a three-pointer with three seconds left to secure a 119-118 win for the Orlando Magic and end the Los Angeles Lakers' unbeaten home record.
articles.title: Los Angeles Lakers 119-118 Orlando Magic: Franz Wagner ends home side's unbeaten run
